title: Hera Pheri (2000)
summary: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: The Quiet Man (1952)
summary: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance (1962)
summary: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.
